# FreeWheel

## Example

### Expand-banner

```html
<amp-ad
  width="300"
  height="250"
  type="freewheel"
  data-zone="2003"
  layout="responsive"
>
</amp-ad>
```

### FloorAd

```html
<amp-sticky-ad layout="”nodisplay”">
  <amp-ad width="350" height="150" type="freewheel" data-zone="2003"> </amp-ad>
</amp-sticky-ad>
```

## Configuration

For details on the configuration semantics, please contact the FreeWheel support team : clientsidesdk@freewheel.tv

Supported parameters:  
All parameters are optional, unless otherwise stated

-   `data-zone` [required]
-   `data-blurDisplay`
-   `data-timeline`
-   `data-soundButton`
-   `data-defaultMute`
-   `data-onOver`
-   `data-closeAction`
-   `data-errorAction`
-   `data-pauseRatio`
-   `data-label`
-   `data-vastUrlParams`
-   `data-gdpr`
-   `data-gdpr_consent`
-   `data-gdpr_consented_providers`
-   `data-useCCPA_USPAPI`
-   `data-_fw_us_privacy`
-   `data-useCMP`
